mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM "xacx_information_push" where "pid" is null or "pid" =''

SELECT push."id" pushid,push."cotent",push."title",push."comentAt",push."comentBy" ,coment."id" comentId ,coment."partagerAt" FROM "xacx_information_push" push join xacx_information_push_partager coment on push."id" = coment."pushId" where coment."partagerBy" = #{partagerBy} ORDER by coment."partagerAt" DESC,push."comentAt" DESC
limit #{limit} OFFSET #{startIndex}
select count(e.*) from (SELECT push."id" FROM "xacx_information_push" push join xacx_information_push_partager coment on push."id" = coment."pushId" where coment."partagerBy" = #{userid} )e

select count(e.*) from (SELECT push."id" FROM "xacx_information_push" push left join xacx_information_push_commenter commenter on push."id" = commenter."pushId" where (commenter."comentBy" = #{userid} or push."comentBy" = #{userid}) )e

SELECT push."id" pushid,push."cotent",push."title",push."comentAt",push."comentBy" ,commenter."id" comentId ,commenter."comentAt" FROM "xacx_information_push" push left join xacx_information_push_commenter commenter on push."id" = commenter."pushId" where commenter."comentBy" = #{comentBy} ORDER by commenter."comentAt" DESC,push."comentAt" DESC
limit #{limit} OFFSET #{startIndex}

select count(e.*) from (SELECT push."id" FROM "xacx_information_push" push join xacx_information_push_collection collection on push."id" = collection."comentId" where collection."collectBy" = #{userid} )e

SELECT push."id" pushid,push."cotent",push."title",push."comentAt",push."comentBy" ,collection."id" collectionId ,collection."collectBy" FROM "xacx_information_push" push join xacx_information_push_collection collection on push."id" = collection."comentId" where collection."collectBy" = #{collectBy} ORDER by collection."collectAt" DESC,push."comentAt" DESC
limit #{limit} OFFSET #{startIndex}
